threads.title: Gavin's Cool Post
threads.body: This is the first post on this super sweet forum!

replies.body: Hey Gavin, it's Gavin. Cool Forum
Let's see if this post works now, if it did, then it's id should be 2
If you're seeing this post, then that means my deactivation guard is working correctly!

replies.title: Super Cool Thread number 2!
replies.body: I'm just posting here to make sure my validators work. Hopefully, I shouldn't be able to post this unless it's over 100 characters long, which it is now, so hopefully it appears on the threads list!
THis is a reply to my post. It has to be longer

threads.body: Hey Gavin, it's Gavin. Cool Forum
Let's see if this post works now, if it did, then it's id should be 2
If you're seeing this post, then that means my deactivation guard is working correctly!

threads.title: Super Cool Thread number 2!
threads.body: I'm just posting here to make sure my validators work. Hopefully, I shouldn't be able to post this unless it's over 100 characters long, which it is now, so hopefully it appears on the threads list!

threads.title: Log number three
threads.body: This is an example post again. It needs to have at least 100 characters or it will not let me press the post butotn. Now that it does, I can.

threads.title: Gavin New Post
threads.body: I spent too long trying to figure this out! :C but its okay now since the editor is now reachable by the rest of the app

threads.title: Random
threads.body: I wonder if you're tired of seeing all of these random posts that I'm testing out the functionality of my app with

threads.title: Somebody Once Told me
threads.body: That I could waste some time, by working over an hour on something. But it turned out that we didn't even need it and now I'm running low on time

replies.body: Hopefully that fixed it. If it didn't, ima be very sad :c
I can be really silly sometimes. I need to pay more attention to what I write. You know how long I spent trying to figure out what was wrong just to see that I forgot to delete a line I meant to?
Hopefully this works on the first try for a change. The form has been slightly modified.

threads.title: New status thread
threads.body: New status thread, checking if these still work correctly after changed the architecture of the threads.

replies.body: I CANT BELIEVE IT ACTUALLY WORKED ON THE FIRST TIME
now I just need to implement replying to other replies and we should be all good for today!
